finale.cpp

00001 /* FINALE.C
00002  Code for displaying the FINALE.CK? files.
00003  Thanks to Andrew Durdin for FIN2BMP, from which I got
00004  the decompression algorithm.
00005  */
00006 
00007 #include "../../../fileio.h"
00008 #include "../../../fileio/ResourceMgmt.h"
00009 #include "../../../FindFile.h"
00010 
00011 #include <fstream>
00012 
00013 int finale_x;
00014 int finale_y;
00015 int finale_count;
00016 int finale_planecol;
00017 int finale_plane_length;
00018 int finale_done;
00019 
00020 // used internally by finale_draw()
00021 void finale_plot( SDL_Surface *sfc, int pix )
00022 {
00023  int mask;
00024  
00025  //TODO: This is a temporary solution. Might be changed later.
00026  mask = 128;
00027  
00028  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(sfc)) SDL_LockSurface(sfc);
00029  Uint8* pixel = (Uint8*) sfc->pixels;
00030  
00031  do
00032  {
00033   if (pix & mask)
00034   {
00035    if (finale_planecol==1)
00036    {
00037     //g_pGraphics->sb_setpixel(finale_x, finale_y, finale_planecol);
00038     if( (finale_y*320 + finale_x) < 320*200 )
00039      pixel[finale_y*320 + finale_x] = finale_planecol;
00040    }
00041    else
00042    {  // merge with previous planes
00043     if( finale_y*finale_x < 320*200 )
00044      pixel[finale_y*320 + finale_x] |= finale_planecol;
00045    }
00046   }
00047   else if (finale_planecol==1)
00048   {
00049    //g_pGraphics->sb_setpixel(finale_x, finale_y, 0);
00050    if( (finale_y*320 + finale_x) < 320*200 )
00051     pixel[finale_y*320 + finale_x] = 0;
00052   }
00053   
00054   finale_x++;
00055   if (finale_x > 319)
00056   {
00057    finale_x = 0;
00058    finale_y++;
00059   }
00060   
00061   finale_count++;
00062   if (finale_count >= finale_plane_length)
00063   {
00064    finale_x = finale_y = 0;
00065    finale_count = 0;
00066    finale_planecol <<= 1;
00067    if (finale_planecol > 8) finale_done = 1;
00068   }
00069   
00070   if (mask==1)
00071   {
00072    return;
00073   }
00074   else
00075   {
00076    mask >>= 1;
00077   }
00078   
00079  } while(1);
00080  
00081  if(SDL_MUSTLOCK(sfc)) SDL_LockSurface(sfc);
00082 }
00083 
00084 // draws a filename file into the SDL_Surface we are using
00085 void finale_draw( SDL_Surface *sfc, const std::string& filename, const std::string& path)
00086 {
00087  int cmdbyte;
00088  int bytecount;
00089  int repeatbyte;
00090  int i;
00091  
00092  std::ifstream file;
00093  if (!OpenGameFileR(file, getResourceFilename(filename, path, true, false), std::ios::binary))
00094   return;
00095  
00096  finale_plane_length = fgetl(file)*2;   //length of a plane when decompressed
00097  finale_planecol = 1;
00098  finale_x = finale_y = 0;
00099  finale_count = 0;
00100  finale_done = 0;
00101  
00102  // decompress/draw the image
00103  do
00104  {
00105   cmdbyte = file.get();
00106   if (cmdbyte<0)
00107   {  // EOF
00108    return;
00109   }
00110   
00111   if (cmdbyte & 0x80)
00112   {
00113    //N + 1 bytes of data follows
00114    bytecount = (cmdbyte & 0x7F) + 1;
00115    for(i=0;i<bytecount;i++)
00116    {
00117     finale_plot( sfc, file.get() );
00118    }
00119   }
00120   else
00121   {
00122    //Repeat N + 3 of following byte
00123    bytecount = (cmdbyte + 3);
00124    repeatbyte = file.get();
00125    for(i=0;i<bytecount;i++)
00126    {
00127     finale_plot( sfc, repeatbyte );
00128    }
00129   }
00130   
00131  } while(!finale_done);
00132  
00133  file.close();
00134 }
